mapper.select: select num as fnum , categorynum as fcategorynum, subject as fsubject, content as fcontent, reg_date freg_date from faq
select num as nnum, subject as nsubject, content as ncontent , reg_date as nreg_date from notice order by notice desc

select num as qnum, q.productnum, p.productname, memberIdx as qmemberIdx, secret, question, answer, answerId,question_date, answer_date, showquestion, identifyday, q_subject from productqna q left outer join product p on q.productnum=p.productnum order by qnum desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice(num, memberIdx, notice, subject, content, hitCount, reg_date, shownotice) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL,#{memberIdx},#{notice}, #{nsubject}, #{ncontent}, 0, SYSDATE, 1)
INSERT INTO noticeFile(fileNum, num, saveFilename, originalFilename) VALUES (noticeFile_seq.NEXTVAL, notice_seq.CURRVAL, #{saveFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalFilename, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
INSERT INTO faq(num, categorynum,userId, subject, content, reg_date) VALUES (faq_seq.NEXTVAL,#{fcategorynum},#{userId}, #{fsubject}, #{fcontent}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE productqna set answer=#{answer}, answerId=#{answerId}, answer_date=SYSDATE WHERE num=#{qnum}
